page.description: Convert any data type to html text, optional search highlighting feature.
page.syntax: C a5_html_label(value as a [,searchHighlights as c])

argument.name: value
argument.description: Value to convert. Can be any type.

argument.name: searchHighlights
argument.description: (optional) A CSS class name followed by = and the pattern(s) to match for highlighting.

page.discussion: The a5_html_label function converts the value into HTML. It includes an optional parameter that can be used to add search highlighting to the generated HTML.
page.example: ? a5_html_label(now()) = "01/16/2012 03:41:30 27 pm" ? a5_html_label(1) = "1" ? a5_html_label("hello world","highlight=world") = hello world ? a5_html_label("hello world","highlight=world"+crlf()+"hel") = hello world
